moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Quash
moves.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
